text: Myriam Montemayor Cruz (born February 8, 1981), better known mononymously as Myriam, is a Mexican recording artist known for winning the first season of Mexican talent show La Academia. ==See also== *Litzy *Darina *Ir√°n Castillo *Lynda *Patricia Manterola Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican singers
title: Myriam Montemayor Cruz
